clean_handle.description: Clean the handle of the box to remove dirt and grime.

close_lid.description: Close the lid of the box by rotating it to its closed position.

open_lid.description: Open the lid of the box by rotating it.

clean_box_body.description: Clean the body of the box to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_box.description: Clean the entire box including the box body, lid, handle, and lock.
